name: Reginald the Slime
description:
This is my first game and my first godot project. It's a short exploration of a platforming concept I thought of for the Black and White 0.(9) jam and took me about a week and a half to make. If you have any feedback or find any bugs please let me know in the comments. I plan on updating this at least once after the jam has concluded to add some more content and QOL functionality, as well as to fix any bugs that show up.

Jam theme: "Death is a new beginning"

Credits:

Music: HorrorPen - "No More Magic": 

https://opengameart.org/content/no-more-magic

SFX: https://sfxr.me/

Tile Collision Code was partially modelled after this project by KidsCanCode: https://github.com/kidscancode/godot_one_shots/blob/master/tilemap_collision/Mai...
